title: Snow Day Malzahar Poidling bug.
body:
So yeah, when I was playing Snow Day Malzahar I noticed that whenever I recalled, the Podling turned completely blue........ lol
I would add a screenshot but for some reason I can't.

replies.body:
Hey Arkantasa, 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zp9O59ds,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-16T17:11:14.591+0000)
>
> Hey Arkantasa, 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!

Awesome! Thanks
